US public holiday: November 28, 2024 – USD payments paused
Bitstamp incoming and outgoing USD payments will be paused on Thursday, November 28, 2024, due to a public holiday in the US.

Due to an upcoming public holiday (Thanksgiving) in the US on Thursday, November 28, 2024, Bitstamp’s bank payment clearing system for incoming and outgoing USD payments will be paused.

EUR SEPA transfers, GBP FPS transfers, as well as credit card, Google Pay, Apple Pay, and PayPal transfers, will be processed without interruptions.

If you need any help or additional information, please contact us at support@bitstamp.net. 

Happy Thanksgiving to our US customers!
